channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: EU says Apple's App Store Is in Breach of Rules
item.description: Apple has been warned that its App Store is in breach of EU rules, and has backtracked on plans to roll out AI tech in Europe over regulatory concerns...

item.title: The Eternal Truth of Markdown
item.description: An exegesis of the most ubiquitous piece of code on the web.
